text.div:
DAF SNOMED CT Substances Other Than Clinical Drugs

SNOMED CT Substance concepts Other Than Clinical Drug Substances that are not represented by RXNORM drug concepts. This value set is meant to be quite broad and includes many substances that may never be prescribed or be a reactant. It does not remove all overlap with RXNORM - for those concepts, the alternative code system should be chosen.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance)
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410942007 (Drug or medicament (substance))
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 438951008 (Substance categorized by hazard characteristics (substance))
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 312412007 (Substance categorized functionally)
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 312413002 (Substance categorised structurally)
  • Exclude codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 312417001 (Substance of abuse)
